description: This file defines Express.js routes for an API related to language model (LLM) catalog, categories, and cost comparison. It sets up endpoint paths and links them to controller functions, documenting the API with Swagger annotations.

methods.name: router.get('/llms')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of all LLMs with optional search and filtering.

methods.name: router.get('/llms/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve details of a specific LLM by ID.

methods.name: router.get('/categories')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve all LLM categories/tags.

methods.name: router.get('/cost-comparison')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve cost comparison data for models.
